name: Healthy Aging and Disability
description: The Healthy Aging and Disability Services Program has provided services to seniors and people with disabilities for more than 48 years. Participants have the opportunity to socialize with their peers who share the same interests through fun and engaging group activities, congregate meals, educational workshops and various organized classes. From technology and computer literacy to Zumba and Karaoke, MNC offers participants a sense of community and enhance overall wellbeing.
